expo.name: StepTracker
expo.description: Track your daily steps and reach your fitness goals with a simple, beautiful step counter.

infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to track your daily steps and physical activity.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app accesses HealthKit to read your step count data.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app accesses HealthKit to update your step count data.

plugins.motionPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access motion and fitness data to track your steps.
